actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and the district courts in certain cases.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Eliminates Federal court jurisdiction to hear or review State actions or laws related to compulsory attendance at public schools on the basis of a student's race, color, creed, or sex.

titles.title: A bill to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and the district courts in certain cases.
